item.title: Industrial Experience
item.description: I have a rich and diverse industry experience of 5 Years as a Software Developer at TechMahindra and as a Validation Specialist (Hardware & Software) at Optel Group, India.

item.title: Projects - Finance
item.description: Stock Price Prediction - Multiple Linear Regression and Adaline Neural Networks This report discusses the performance and statistics of two models: Multiple Linear Regression and Adaline Neural Network for Stock Price Prediction.

item.title: Projects - Medical Statistics
item.description: Statistical Analysis on the Effects of Asthma Drug for Pulmonary function The report gives a statistical insight into the effectiveness of a new Asthma Drug on Pulmonary Function.

item.title: Was it the smartest presentation for 5 minutes? - BlogTime
item.description: As my job-hunt continues, in an interview with one of the Big 4 Consulting firms, I had the opportunity to present on Smart Workspaces in 5 minutes.
